00020 #ifndef _XENO_NUCLEUS_ASSERT_H
00021 #define _XENO_NUCLEUS_ASSERT_H
00022 
00023 #include <nucleus/compiler.h>
00024 
00025 #define XENO_ASSERT(subsystem,cond,action)  do { \
00026     if (unlikely(CONFIG_XENO_OPT_DEBUG_##subsystem > 0 && !(cond))) { \
00027         xnarch_trace_panic_freeze(); \
00028         xnlogerr("assertion failed at %s:%d (%s)\n", __FILE__, __LINE__, (#cond)); \
00029         xnarch_trace_panic_dump(); \
00030         action; \
00031     } \
00032 } while(0)
00033 
00034 #define XENO_BUGON(subsystem,cond)  do { \
00035     if (unlikely(CONFIG_XENO_OPT_DEBUG_##subsystem > 0 && (cond))) \
00036         xnpod_fatal("bug at %s:%d (%s)", __FILE__, __LINE__, (#cond)); \
00037 } while(0)
00038 
00039 #endif /* !_XENO_NUCLEUS_ASSERT_H */
